title: Increasing Cursor size (In-game)
body: Hello boards, just wanted to hear your thoughts on how i can fix the size of my cursor because it has become way too small to play with in-game. I just bought a new labtop so im pretty sure thats what is causing the problem. Anyone that knows how please help me out quick, i would appreciate it, thanks!

replies.body: I had the same issue. My laptop runs on 4k so you have to change the resolution in league to something lower. It should help increase the tiny map size too if you have that issue as well >~<

We don't currently have options for modifying the in-game cursor, and don't support modifications to adjust it.    You may need to rescale your resolution, especially if it's a 4k screen.  Be super wary about finding anything online, we don't support any third parties or changes that could be deemed as causing an unfair advantage per our [third party](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) guide.
